title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5702.3 - Authority's prerogatives
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5702.3 - Authority's prerogatives

State Regulations

As a condition of the special permit or escort set forth in
section
5701.3
of this Chapter, the
authority shall specify the time of crossing, provide escort if deemed
necessary, and be fully compensated for any and all costs associated with the
clearance and crossing of the radioactive materials. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5702.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
